EquipmentSpoofer_desc: This script will prevent you getting a cheater tag as client for using weapons or other equipments, for which you do not actually own the DLC. This spoofs the following:Primary and Secondary weapon,Melee weapon,Grenade,Deployable(2 slots),Mask,Armor,Armor skin,Suit style,Gloves
HideWeaponSkinsForOthers_desc: Updated version of Unbannable Fake Skins
P3DHack_Beta_desc: Experimental features that we are currently working on
How_to_NameSpoofer_1: If you want change OVERKILL_Almir Name in Name Spoofer:
How_to_NameSpoofer_3: Replace the OVERKILL_Almir with your desired name.
spoofs_desc: Spoofs your loot drop in multiplayer to always be a random legendary skins
WandV_Menu_fix_help: Interaction function will be from Huds
antistop_back_desc: Bring the effect back to your enemy
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_Skin_1: Which is only because of a massive convenience of the weapon mods being marked as unobtainable
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_levle_1: Getting infamy level without a single heist completed
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_levle_2: Getting infamy level without getting 100 level
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_levle_3: Skipping next infamy level, like from 1 to 3
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_heist_2: Spawning any equipment, different from last equipment you spawned
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_heist_3: Throwing more than the allowed amount of grenades
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_heist_4: Picking up a grenade from grenades crate case increases the limit
menu_f11_cheater_teg_menu_heist_5: Spawning more than the allowed amount of equipment
teg_del_3: Restart the game and try to join
teg_del_7: Using F10, remove the problem moments
teg_del_8: In the worst case, go to Settings/Extended/Clear progress
NoBagBodies: No Bag Bodies [Cheater Tag for Client]
shoot_through_wall_thickness_desc: Set the value of through how many things you can shoot, 40 is a normal wall
shoot_through_wall_desc: This does not give you the ability to shoot through walls!
target_closest_desc: Set to true if you want to target the enemy that is closest to your crosshair instead of just any
XP_bust_help2: , Enable For Each Map You Want To Multiply
waypoint_rat_desc: Would you like to activate Meth Helper Waypoints?
config_title: How to Edit a Configuration File in P3DHack
NameSpoofer_desc: Set your new name in game, set to false in order to use your steam name
How_to_NameSpoofer_desc: Click here to know how to change OVERKILL_Almir name
secret_skills_desc: All the skills, but the skill Frenzy does not give negative effects and reduced health
fast_scroll_desc: Now you can fast scroll settings menu
unbannable_skin_desc: It will not mark you ever as a cheater, even when equipping legendary skins
removeWallet_desc: Remove offshore and coins amount from crime spree lobby
show_spree_desc: Show RSS in crime spree lobby
OFFSET_X_desc: Specify horisontal offset of the news feed
OFFSET_Y_desc: Specify vertical offset of the news feed
PRESENT_TIME_desc: How long does it take each title to appear
SUSTAIN_TIME_desc: How long each title stays on screen
REMOVE_TIME_desc: How long does it take each title to disappear
MAX_NEWS_desc: Max news to load from every source
MAX_NEWS_SHOW_desc: Total amount of news to rotate. Each source gets equal amount
MIX_desc: Titles mixing. If OFF then titles will be shown in the order of the sources in the config
hints_1: We work hard to make P3DHack better!
hide_text_desc: You can turn off the mention of P3DHack
reboard_help: You can endlessly use the boards on the window
mod_list_lite_desc: Corrects a problem with freezing game when you viewing list of BLT mods
RightClick_desc: Only let the AimBot shoot if the right mouse button is held
I_Use_VR_desc: Activate this option if you are using VR
save_and_reload_desc: This function will help you instantly apply changes to P3DHack Config
P3DHack_Menu_desc: Fast and convenient functionality in one place
Camera_Bag_Explosion_Multiplier_desc: Do you want enabled Explosive Bag Camera Effect Multiplier?
Toggle_Interact_desc: Do you want enabled Interact Toggle?
Classic_Open_Door_title: Classic Option Of Open All Doors
Classic_Open_Door_desc: Classic Option Of Open All Doors May Not Work Everywhere But Is More Limited To Specific Doors
New_Open_Door_title: New Option Of Open All Doors
New_Open_Door_desc: New Option Of Open All Doors, Opens All Pick Locakable Doors, Safes, Deposit Boxes ETC. Which Classic Option Does Not Do
Anti_Cheat_Disable_desc: Allows you to spawn bags and much more
Secure_BodyBags_Loot_Value_desc: Secure Body Bags For Cash Value Amount
Rats_Message_desc: Display Correct Chemical In Chat Message
delete_units: Delete all synchronized units from map
Skip_End_Screen_title: Allows You To Skip End Screen
rave_desc: Would you like run fast hostage?
antistop_desc: Enable if you do not want to suffer having a tag
antistop_info_desc: Enable if you want to know who tried to slow you down. Spam is possible
slow_you: tried to slow you down with speed
text_in_game_desc: Would you like to remove text from the main menu?
Auto_Drill_Service_desc: Automatically recovers drill in case of damage
Instant_Interact_With_Anything_desc: For example to board up windows, or add ingredients to Cook OFF
waypoints_showDistance_desc: Shows the distance to the waypoint for each waypoint.
waypoints_showGagePickups_desc: Shows Gage pickups on the map.
waypoints_showSmallLoot_desc: Shows grabbables, like loose money or jewelry.
waypoints_showCrates_desc: Shows openable crates, like the ones in Election Day.
waypoints_showDoors_desc: Shows a lock symbol on doors that require a keycard or ECM to open.
waypoints_showCameraComputers_desc: Shows where the computers to view cameras are on the map.
waypoints_showDrills_desc: Shows where you can place a small drill.
waypoints_showThermite_desc: Shows thermite pickup locations and where to use it.
waypoints_showSewerManhole_desc: Shows where sewer manhole covers are.
waypoints_showHUDMessages_desc: Displays various information on your HUD about the waypoints.
waypoints_makeNoise_desc: Makes a noise when the script is run.
waypoints_iterativeToggle_desc:
On means that every time you run the script, it will find the next available waypoint to show.
Off means it will show all waypoints at once.
waypoints_sheaterNewb_desc: Enabling this will show a lot of things to other people, like the goats and voting machines.
next_menu_help_p3dhack: Opens the Next Page of the Current Open Menu
prew_menu_help_p3dhack: Opens the Previous Page of the Current Open Menu
pagedom_help: If Using Instant Dominate This MUST Be Turned On First For Both To Work
steal_pagers_on_melee_help: Disables Pager When You Melee A Guard
dirtymoney_help: Drops 2 Gold Bags Upon AI Death
autocook_help: Automates Cooking In Rats Day 1 And Cook Off, Must Have Chemicals To Continue The Cooking
civil_help: Intimidate All Civilians, Press Multiple Times To Get Down On Floor
heistintel_help: Can Only Drop In Transport Heists
getpatht_help: Must Enable CarryStacker, Grabs All Necessary Items To Continue Mission
anticheat_help: Enable or Disable Anti-Cheats For Host And Client
InstantHackAll_help: Hack Available Computers, Keypads, Phones Or Electrical Boxes
opencrate_help: You Can Close Available Crates Also
picklockst_help: This Does Not Open Security Doors
picklockst1_help: Opens All Pick Locks Including Deposit Boxes, This Does Not Open Security Doors
c4open: Open All Doors & Safes With C4
usekeycardt_help: Open Any Door That Uses KeyCard Including Security Rooms
DrillAll_help: Start or Restart Any Available Drill
takeintel_help: Hit Twice for Intel In Safes
instanttie_help: Must Alert All Civilians Before Activating
heistintel_info: Train Heist Intel Has Been Dropped
ecmopen_info: All Security Doors Opened With ECM
InstantHackAll_info: All Electrical/Circuit Boxes Hacked And Opened
instanthackmachines_info: All Voting Machines Hacked And Opened
main_menu_f5_text4: Big Oil Engine Menu - Select Engine
main_menu_f5_text7_help: Do Not Spam, Will Cause Crash
main_menu_f5_text10_help: Make Ammo Shell Bags Explosive Again
main_menu_f5_text11_help: CarryStacker Must Be Enabled Or Bags Will Get Deleted
takeloot_help: Must Enable CarryStacker, If White Xmas Press Twice
OpenAllLoot: Open All ATMs, Safes, Money Drawers
main_menu_f7_text1: INTERACT TIMER OPTIONS (DECREASES TIMER TO 3 SECONDS)
releaseteam: Release all your teammates from custody
depositfill_help: Fill all deposit boxes with gold and cash. Does not work on all levels!
openvault_help: Open any vault doors. Does not work with all kinds of vaults and may affect gameplay proggress.
del5: DELETE OR LOCK ALL SLOTS AND ITEMS
dontwait_help: Force Start The Game, Prevent Waiting
text_f10_3с_1_help: Restricts Grenades Being Thrown While In Stealth
text_f10_3с_10_help: Multiply XP Earned By 2x, Enable For Each Map You Want To Multiply
spawn_lootmode: Spawn looted / objects / vehicles on crosshair
p3d_toggle_buddha_description: Your health does not go below 1.
p3d_toggle_spooc_cuff_description: Cloakers will arrest players instead of incapacitate them.
p3d_toggle_auto_drill_service_descriptio: Automatically repair drills and hacking devices.
p3d_toggle_unlimited_equipment_descripti: Special equipment such as cable ties will not be used after interacting.
p3d_toggle_disable_bag_penalties_descrip: Removes weight and explove properties from all bags.
p3d_toggle_crosshair_drop_description: Dopped bags spawn at your crosshair's position instead of your camera's
p3d_toggle_carry_stacker_description: Will mark you as cheater if you are not the host.
p3d_toggle_carry_weight_description: Your movement speed decreased based on the amount of bags you are carrying.
p3d_toggle_zipline_transport_description: Allows you To transport bags on any zipline
p3d_warning_contract_not_owned: You do not own this DLC, you will be marked as cheater while hosting it.
p3d_toggle_indestructible_sentries_descr: Note: enemy sentries also become invulnerable to damage.
p3d_toggle_lifesteal_ammo_description: Every shot that connects with an enemy will heal you.
